mobisocial.musubi.encoding

Class ObjEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobisocial.musubi.encoding.ObjEncoder

  • public class ObjEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

    Encodes and decodes data available to Musubi for transmission across the network.

    Data is encoded as follows. The first four bytes are the int value 30050081, indicating the use of ObjFormat. The next four bytes are reserved. The following n bytes are a bson encoded data structure.
